name: Northeast Alumni Building and Loan Association, Appellant, v. Schreiber
name_abbreviation: Northeast Alumni Building & Loan Ass'n v. Schreiber

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
parties: Northeast Alumni Building and Loan Association, Appellant, v. Schreiber.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
The final decree entered in this case is affirmed on the adjudication filed by Judge Guebin of the Court of Common Pleas No. 4 of Philadelphia County, published in 20 Pa. D. & C. 2d 101, at appellant’s cost.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Joseph, W. Marshall, Jr., with him Duane, Morris & Hechscher, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Northeast Alumni Building and Loan Association, Appellant, v. Schreiber.
March 15, 1960:
Argued January 6,1960.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
A. WalUng Levin, for appellant.
Joseph, W. Marshall, Jr., with him Duane, Morris & Hechscher, for appellee.
